game.name: Off Target
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: "Off-Target" is a classic side-scrolling shooter set in the near future. Experience the thrill of shooting and the feeling of explosions in your spare time.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Off-Target" is a classic side-scrolling shooter set in the near future. Experience the thrill of shooting and the feeling of explosions in your spare time.
